import { Fragment, useState } from 'react' import { Dialog, Transition } from '@headlessui/react' import { ExclamationTriangleIcon, XMarkIcon,ClipboardDocumentListIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline' import cv from "../../images/cv.png" function Modal({onClose}) { const [open, setOpen] = useState(false) return ( <>
) } export default Modal;
